price: Obi a osuroo Ahummͻborͻ Hene no wͻ kokoa mu, na ͻde nnuhoo anaasε adwen sakra akoma san baeε no.
arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: man khashiya al-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi wajāa biqalbin munībin
